Package index

All functions

align_left()
Left-align text and pad to same length.
define_paths()
Find path for files to log
logging_from_yaml()
Read and create summary data frame
one_step_logging()
Logging one step from yaml
options
whirl Options
render_summary()
Render dataframe into a summary.html file
run()
Execute single or multiple R, R Markdown, and Quarto scripts by pointing directly to the file(s) or by pointing to a whirl config file
run_by_config()
Create logs for files from a yaml configuration
run_paths()
Execute multiple R, R Markdown, and Quarto scripts
run_script()
Run script test with a single script
